sub_title: Subsurface Data Manager at NAM - Shell
summary:
Expert in Well Facilities and Reservoir Management processes. Production Technology Data Consultant from since 2012 to 2016 and have a broad expertise in various subsurface disciplines. Extensive knowledge in applying LEAN business principles in WRFM and Technical Data Management processes.
20+ years experience in Petrophysics and  global Subsurface Data Managementand have been leading some and participating in various regional projects & teams mainly related to WRFM, Recall, Techlog TDM and global and regional DM standards and initiatives.

Specialties: Well Facilities and Reservoir Management processes and software development
Petrophysics applications and databases (Recall and Techlog)
Data Analysis
Well Data & Information Management
Team Leadership
Project Management
Providing Subsurface TDM training
